title: How could i check the total skin
body: How could i check the total skin i have ?

replies.body:
I'm not entirely sure if riot is okay with it but the site elophant has a litle tool that you can use while opening the client and it will save all your owned skins to their site so you can view them! :) I've used it a few times and it worked perfectly for me so far.

https://www.elophant.com/
We don't currently have a meter to show the specifics, beyond manually counting what you've unlocked.  :X
If you send a ticket to player support, could they tell you?
